targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, count(distinct ResourceAttributes['k8s.pod.uid']) FROM $table 
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND ServiceName = $cluster
AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.phase'
GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='K8s Pods Overview', user='4' */
SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (5 * 1000)) * (5 * 1000)) as t, count(distinct ResourceAttributes['k8s.pod.uid']) FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge 
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1753421014,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1753424614,3) 
AND ServiceName = 'scout-euw1-apps-eks'
AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.phase'
GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries t, Value, count(distinct(ResourceAttributes['k8s.pod.name']))
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.phase'
AND ServiceName = $cluster

GROUP BY t, Value ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='K8s Pods Overview', user='2' */
SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (2 * 1000)) * (2 * 1000)) t, Value, count(distinct(ResourceAttributes['k8s.pod.name']))
FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752241887,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752245487,3)
AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.phase'
AND ServiceName = 'scout-aps1-apps-eks'

GROUP BY t, Value ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries t, Value as Phase, count(distinct(ResourceAttributes['k8s.pod.name'])) as Pods
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND ServiceName = $cluster
AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.phase'

--AND ResourceAttributes['k8s.namespace.name'] != 'kube-system'
GROUP BY t, Phase
ORDER BY t, Phase ASC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='K8s Pods Overview', user='2' */
SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (2 * 1000)) * (2 * 1000)) t, Value as Phase, count(distinct(ResourceAttributes['k8s.pod.name'])) as Pods
FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1752241887,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1752245487,3)
AND ServiceName = 'scout-aps1-apps-eks'
AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.phase'


GROUP BY t, Phase
ORDER BY t, Phase ASC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
$columns(ResourceAttributes['k8s.namespace.name'] Namespace, count(*) as NoOfPods)
FROM $table
WHERE ServiceName = $cluster
AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.phase'
GROUP BY t, Namespace ORDER BY t, NoOfPods
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='K8s Pods Overview', user='2' */
SELECT t, groupArray((Namespace, NoOfPods)) AS groupArr FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (2 * 1000)) * (2 * 1000)) AS t, ResourceAttributes['k8s.namespace.name'] Namespace, count(*) as NoOfPods FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751304776,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751308376,3) AND ServiceName = 'b14-003-hz-mk8s'
AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.phase' GROUP BY t, Namespace ORDER BY t, NoOfPods) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
$columns(ResourceAttributes['k8s.container.name'] container, anyLast(Value) c)
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND MetricName = 'k8s.container.restarts'
AND ServiceName = $cluster
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='K8s Pods Overview', user='2' */
SELECT t, groupArray((container, c)) AS groupArr FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (2 * 1000)) * (2 * 1000)) AS t, ResourceAttributes['k8s.container.name'] container, anyLast(Value) c FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751304776,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751308376,3) AND TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751304776,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751308376,3)
AND MetricName = 'k8s.container.restarts'
AND ServiceName = 'b14-003-hz-mk8s' GROUP BY t, container ORDER BY t, container) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
$columns(ResourceAttributes['k8s.pod.name'] as pod, max(Value)*1000 as CPUUtilisation)
FROM $table 
WHERE ServiceName = $cluster
AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.cpu.utilization'
GROUP BY t, pod ORDER BY t, CPUUtilisation DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='K8s Pods Overview', user='2' */
SELECT t, groupArray((pod, CPUUtilisation)) AS groupArr FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (2 * 1000)) * (2 * 1000)) AS t, ResourceAttributes['k8s.pod.name'] as pod, max(Value) * 1000 as CPUUtilisation FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge 
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751304776,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751308376,3) AND ServiceName = 'b14-003-hz-mk8s'
AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.cpu.utilization' GROUP BY t, pod ORDER BY t, CPUUtilisation DESC) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
$columns(ResourceAttributes['k8s.pod.name'] as pod, max(Value) as MemoryUsage)
FROM $table
WHERE  ServiceName = $cluster

AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.memory.usage'
GROUP BY t, pod ORDER BY t, MemoryUsage DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='K8s Pods Overview', user='2' */
SELECT t, groupArray((pod, MemoryUsage)) AS groupArr FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (2 * 1000)) * (2 * 1000)) AS t, ResourceAttributes['k8s.pod.name'] as pod, max(Value) as MemoryUsage FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751304776,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751308376,3) AND  ServiceName = 'b14-003-hz-mk8s'

AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.memory.usage' GROUP BY t, pod ORDER BY t, MemoryUsage DESC) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
$columns(ResourceAttributes['k8s.pod.name'] as pod, max(Value)*1000 as CPUUtilisation)
FROM $table
WHERE ServiceName = $cluster
AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.cpu.utilization'
GROUP BY t, pod ORDER BY t, CPUUtilisation DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='K8s Pods Overview', user='2' */
SELECT t, groupArray((pod, CPUUtilisation)) AS groupArr FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (2 * 1000)) * (2 * 1000)) AS t, ResourceAttributes['k8s.pod.name'] as pod, max(Value) * 1000 as CPUUtilisation FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751304776,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751308376,3) AND ServiceName = 'b14-003-hz-mk8s'
AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.cpu.utilization' GROUP BY t, pod ORDER BY t, CPUUtilisation DESC) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
$columns(ResourceAttributes['k8s.pod.name'] as pod, max(Value) as MemoryUsage)
FROM $table
WHERE ServiceName = $cluster
AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.memory.usage'
GROUP BY t, pod ORDER BY t, MemoryUsage DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='K8s Pods Overview', user='2' */
SELECT t, groupArray((pod, MemoryUsage)) AS groupArr FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (2 * 1000)) * (2 * 1000)) AS t, ResourceAttributes['k8s.pod.name'] as pod, max(Value) as MemoryUsage FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751304776,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751308376,3) AND ServiceName = 'b14-003-hz-mk8s'
AND MetricName = 'k8s.pod.memory.usage' GROUP BY t, pod ORDER BY t, MemoryUsage DESC) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
$columns(ResourceAttributes['k8s.container.name'] as pod, max(Value)*1000 as CPUUtilisation)
FROM $table
WHERE  ServiceName = $cluster

AND MetricName = 'container.cpu.utilization'
GROUP BY t, pod ORDER BY t, CPUUtilisation DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='K8s Pods Overview', user='2' */
SELECT t, groupArray((pod, CPUUtilisation)) AS groupArr FROM ( SELECT (intDiv(toFloat64(TimeUnix) * 1000, (2 * 1000)) * (2 * 1000)) AS t, ResourceAttributes['k8s.container.name'] as pod, max(Value) * 1000 as CPUUtilisation FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751304776,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751308376,3) AND  ServiceName = 'b14-003-hz-mk8s'

AND MetricName = 'container.cpu.utilization' GROUP BY t, pod ORDER BY t, CPUUtilisation DESC) GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
$columns(ResourceAttributes['k8s.container.name'] as pod, max(Value) as MemoryUsage)
FROM $table
WHERE  ServiceName = $cluster

AND MetricName = 'container.memory.usage'
GROUP BY t, pod ORDER BY t, MemoryUsage DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='K8s Pods Overview', user='2' */

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT ResourceAttributes['k8s.container.name'] as Container,  anyLast(Value) Status
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND ServiceName = $cluster
AND MetricName = 'k8s.container.ready'
GROUP BY Container ORDER BY Status DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='K8s Pods Overview', user='2' */
SELECT ResourceAttributes['k8s.container.name'] as Container,  anyLast(Value) Status
FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751304776,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751308376,3)
AND ServiceName = 'b14-003-hz-mk8s'
AND MetricName = 'k8s.container.ready'
GROUP BY Container ORDER BY Status DESC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT ResourceAttributes['k8s.container.name'] as Container, max(Value)*1000 as CPUUtilisation
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND ServiceName = $cluster
AND MetricName = 'container.cpu.utilization'
GROUP BY Container ORDER BY CPUUtilisation DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='K8s Pods Overview', user='2' */
SELECT ResourceAttributes['k8s.container.name'] as Container, max(Value)*1000 as CPUUtilisation
FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751304776,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751308376,3)
AND ServiceName = 'b14-003-hz-mk8s'
AND MetricName = 'container.cpu.utilization'
GROUP BY Container ORDER BY CPUUtilisation DESC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:

WHERE $timeFilter
AND ServiceName = $cluster
AND MetricName = 'container.filesystem.usage'
GROUP BY Container ORDER BY UsedDisk DESC

AND ServiceName = 'b14-003-hz-mk8s'
AND MetricName = 'container.filesystem.usage'
GROUP BY Container ORDER BY UsedDisk DESC

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

WHERE $timeFilter
AND ServiceName = $cluster
AND MetricName = 'k8s.container.restarts'

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT ResourceAttributes['k8s.container.name'] as Container, anyLast(ResourceAttributes['container.image.name']) Image
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND ServiceName = $cluster
AND MetricName = 'k8s.container.ready'
GROUP BY Container ORDER BY Image DESC
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='K8s Pods Overview', user='2' */
SELECT ResourceAttributes['k8s.container.name'] as Container, anyLast(ResourceAttributes['container.image.name']) Image
FROM base14.otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE TimeUnix >= toDateTime64(1751304776,3) AND TimeUnix <= toDateTime64(1751308376,3)
AND ServiceName = 'b14-003-hz-mk8s'
AND MetricName = 'k8s.container.ready'
GROUP BY Container ORDER BY Image DESC

list.definition:
SELECT distinct ServiceName from $table where TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
and (ServiceName like '%-mk8s' OR ServiceName like '%-eks' OR ServiceName = 'k8s' or ServiceName like '%-gke')
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster

query.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
query.query:
SELECT distinct ServiceName from $table where TimeUnix > now() - interval 1 hour
and (ServiceName like '%-mk8s' OR ServiceName like '%-eks' OR ServiceName = 'k8s' or ServiceName like '%-gke')
